channel.title: Getting Started on Nifty
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Nifty

item.title: Variables
item.description: Variables in nifty work a little bit differently than in other languages. Variables Variables are declared with the let keyword. 1let x: int = 12 The types can be inferred. 1let x = 12 // x is an int. 2let y = someFunc() The variable declaration operator can be used as well. 1a := 12 // x is an int. 2b := 12.f // b is a float/f32. 3c := 12.

item.title: Types
item.description: Basic Types 1char // same as u32 defaults to '\0' 2int // same as s32 defaults to 0 3uint // same as u32 defaults to 0 4float // same as f32 defaults to 0.f 5double // same as f64 defaults to 0.d 6 7uintptr // defaults to 0 8 9// defaults to false 10bool b8 b16 b32 b64 11 12// defaults to 0 13u8 u16 u32 u64 u128 14s8 s16 s32 s64 s128 15 16//defaults to 0.
